name: Slime Tavern
description:
A tavern has been invaded by slimes!! (how is that possible) You  are summoned to defeat all of the slimes there at all cost!

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

I,J,K,L to shoot (Just like Binding of Isaac)

M to mute (pls dont the audio is awesome!)

Click the button with your mouse to play!

Game assets are made by o_lobster go check the game assets and o_lobster!

https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

https://itch.io/profile/o-lobster

Link to the background music go check it out they have awesome music!!
